original_title: Woman dies from Accident in Thirappane
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – It was reported that a woman had died in an accident in Yanamkulam, Thirappane.
The accident had taken place when a car collided with a motorbike. The victim that died in the tragic circumstances was a 52-year-old who was a pillion rider on the motorbike.
Sri Lanka Police have taken the driver of the other vehicle into custody
